Name: New Port Codebreaker
Ingredients: 15 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: This straw yellow drink is a most unusual mix of ingredients.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 1999 at Perter's Bar, Covent Garden, London.
Nutrition: One serving of New Port Codebreaker contains 280 calories
